18/* for netdissect_options */
19#include "netdissect.h"
20
21/* signature checking result codes */
22#define SIGNATURE_VALID 0
23#define SIGNATURE_INVALID 1
24#define CANT_ALLOCATE_COPY 2
25#define CANT_CHECK_SIGNATURE 3
26
27extern const struct tok signature_check_values[];
28extern int signature_verify(netdissect_options *, const u_char *, u_int,
29 const u_char *, void (*)(void *), const void *);
